lusis

  • Model View Culture: Q&A: Making Tech Events Accessible to the Deaf Community

  • Betraying The Martyrs - Let It Go (Official Music Video) \m/

Nathen

Dan

  • A challenge to everyone involved in organising tech events: how can we leverage our many social gatherings for the greater social good? For example, consider the 1:1:1 model in the context of tech events, or even something as simple as donating some of the profits to charity (perhaps to build a well).

  • CPOSC, especially Charlie Reisinger's DevOps is Cool for Schools
  • Write in Go (song/video)

entry.title: Adaptive Fault Detection
entry.content:
Show Date: Monday, March 4, 2013

In this episode, we sat down with Baron Schwartz to discuss his presentation on Adaptive Fault Detection. Jason Dixon and Brandon Burton joined the conversation.
